name: Zero Point Zero
description:
Made for the 2021-2022 utGDDC Game Making Deathmatch competition.

A short action platformer through a frozen world, where heat acts as your energy, your health, and your power. Get through levels of platforming and fight through packs of enemies to get to your destination. 

This game can be played in the browser, or downloaded to Windows PCs, but the experience is the same. The downloadable version may result in slightly better performance and visuals. 

Note: You can press "ESC" in game to bring up the pause menu to change the volume and reset the level if you get stuck. In the browser version of the game, this is only possible when not in full screen mode.
